data.text: @InAMadWorld111 And they aren't done. This whole two years was to gauge 1. people's ignorance & 2. Their willingness to be obedient to any order. Most did not challenge the narrative or the legality of it. Now the PTB know they can reinstate whenever they want.
@InAMadWorld111 Part of the planned "great reset". Kissinger predicted all of this back in the 1990s.

@coletteinusa There's a guy who is a native of NYC and he has a YT channel where he does walks all around the city and he just left the city for another state because, among other things, the crime rate is out of control and many businesses are shutting down because of shoplifting. 😟😡
